summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3762 for the improvement of Chapin Place, from North 65th Street to Woodlawn Avenue; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46282, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
